website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for those looking to sit more than lounge.
pros: Very comfortable, and you get to "sit up" better than you do with other options
Comes in a variety of colors and prints
cons: Chair can be difficult to inflate
Some buyers say this option doesn't hold air well

customer_reviews.title: Not So Easy to Inflate
customer_reviews.text: I watched a ton of YouTube videos about inflating this kind of thing and thought I'd be able to do it with relative ease. I bought two to take to an outdoor concert in the summer. Well... my practice filling sessions taught me that unless there was a breeze I was going to be a sweaty mess from running around trying to get enough air into it. I would also be the featured comedy act for others at the concert. I returned mine. That was easy to return and the vendor was fine, it just wasn't a good product for me.
customer_reviews.author: HappyDog

customer_reviews.title: Not Terribly Functional
customer_reviews.text: If only it could hold the air longer. It's difficult to get enough air in there to make it functional and comfortable, but if you're to get up and sit back down it's ruined. It's good for its intended purpose of carrying to the beach, but definitely not good as a spare chair around the house or as a gaming chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lucid Spark

customer_reviews.title: These is quite different lounger but comfy and fun to inflated it
customer_reviews.text: These is quite different lounger but comfy and fun to inflated it. I had to run around in my back yard it was fun & silly. Started with an empty bag and finished with a comfortable lounger easy to close it and to use it. Comes with a carryon bag as well. It's well manufactured to last.
customer_reviews.author: virginia ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: My Traveling MVP
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bring to Disney World and it was the MVP of our trip. People and employees were walking by and asking about it. I was surprised I saw no one else with one of these. It's GENIUS for theme parks and airports etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money Impossible to inflate You are expected to wave it back and forth until it fills with air so Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: ladywhosamom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Comfortable and we can take any where we like.
customer_reviews.author: Deelip Chhetri

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to inflate and clip together! My kid loves it. It is the only thing he wants to watch movies in now. Deffinatly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gomez

customer_reviews.title: not what it seems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. It is really hard to inflate. I dont think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Howard

customer_reviews.title: Can’t even fill this with ocean level winds
customer_reviews.text: You can never get enough air in it to work even with heavy beach winds :( do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could not get them to blow up. Hard to get air into them
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Crowley

customer_reviews.title: So difficult to inflate.
customer_reviews.text: So difficult to inflate. The way the Velcro pouches are its very difficult to get it to inflate enough to use
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Skerratt

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all as advertised. It is impossible to fill. So sorry I bought it
customer_reviews.author: tcm

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: My WHOLE household tried to inflate this. NEVER WORKED like any of the pix NOR the instructions! I was really hurt because the children were not able to enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Aman Mc

customer_reviews.title: I was twirling around for a good 20 minutes trying to get air into it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Lol doesn't work. I was twirling around for a good 20 minutes trying to get air into it on a windy day . Didn't fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Farhana
